short_summary: Relocation Services in National Capital Region
description: Relocation Services in National Capital Region as detailed in the Statement of Work, Annex A to the bid solicitation. The period of the contract is from Contract Award Date to 31 March 2025 with the option to extend for up to (1) additional (1) one year option period. This includes relocation services in the National Capital Region, stemming from employee mobility and population growth. The Contractor is required to relocate employees from the area of work to other area of work. The details of such relocation services to be carried out in accordance to the \"Canadian Standard Association\" very detailed requirements of displacement with fully knowledgeable personnel and broad experience. The following parameters information easy to found:",
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Relocation Services – National Capital Region

#### Tender Reference

* Reference Number: cb-7462-14596840
* Solicitation Number: 5000072500
* Amendment Number: 4
* Amendment Date: 2023-08-30
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-30 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-03-31

#### Tender Details

* Contracting Entity: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* UNSPSC Code: 78101804
* UNSPSC Description: Relocation Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods
* Trade Agreements: Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents

#### Request for Proposal

Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking proposals for Relocation Services in the National Capital Region. The contract is expected to commence on September 1, 2023, and will span a term of two years with the option to extend for an additional one-year period.

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7462/5000072500_rfp-eng.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7462/5000072500_rfp-fr.pdf>

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact:

Samantha Hatzinikou
Phone: (873) 500-0150
Email: [samantha.hatzinikou@ec.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.hatzinikou@ec.gc.ca)太阳城
